cause.description:
People think that aliens are a pigment of our imagination but do u really think in all of our universe we r the only planet with life? WEll think again I personally believe in Aliens and i dont care wat u think BUT i think we should let people investigate and therefore prove or disprove this fact.
1. The Rosetta Stone isnt the only stone!
2. The UFO's r triangular!?
3. We must investigate other planets to prove or disprove the exsistance of martians!
cause.name: Alien Invasions
